name: @yongkangc/scry-mcp-raw-js
description:
Provide real-time and comprehensive cryptocurrency and DeFi data from multiple trusted Sources. 

Enable AI assistants to access market data, trending coins, protocol analytics, and more with intelligent rate limiting and caching for optimal performance. 

Integrate seamlessly with MCP clients to enhance your crypto-related applications and workflows.

tools.name: coingecko_get_trending_coins
tools.description: Discover trending cryptocurrencies based on real-time search activity from CoinGecko users. Use for identifying market attention, viral projects, and emerging opportunities. Updated every few hours with search volume rankings. This is unique CoinGecko data not available elsewhere.

tools.name: get_top_protocols
tools.description: Get top DeFi protocols ranked by TVL with filtering by category and blockchain. Recommended over get_protocols for manageable result sets that won't overwhelm responses. Returns formatted TVL values, 24h changes, and chain distribution data for quick protocol discovery.

chain.description: Filter by blockchain ('Ethereum', 'BSC', 'Polygon', 'Arbitrum'). Use exact chain names for accurate results

limit.description: Number of top protocols to return (1-100, default: 10). Use smaller values for quick insights, larger for comprehensive market overview

category.description: Filter by category ('Dexes', 'Lending', 'Yield', 'CDP'). Use exact category names for precise filtering

tools.name: defillama_get_protocols_paginated
tools.description: Browse DeFi protocols with pagination and sorting for comprehensive market analysis. Use for large datasets when get_top_protocols isn't sufficient. Returns structured data with pagination controls and flexible sorting options.

page.description: Page number (starting from 1). Use for iterating through large protocol datasets

limit.description: Number of protocols per page (1-100, default: 20). Larger values for fewer API calls, smaller for faster responses

sort_by.description: Sort protocols by field (tvl for market cap ranking, change_1d/7d for performance analysis)

sort_order.description: Sort order (desc for top performers, asc for reverse ranking)

tools.name: defillama_search_protocols
tools.description: Search for DeFi protocols by name, symbol, category, or description. Returns matching protocols sorted by TVL.

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-50, default: 10)

query.description: Search query (protocol name, symbol, category, or keyword)

tools.name: get_historical_tvl
tools.description: Get monthly aggregated TVL data for any protocol, returning highest, mean, and lowest TVL for each month. This prevents context window overflow while providing comprehensive historical insights. Data is automatically aggregated from daily values during caching.

protocol.description: Protocol name or identifier (e.g., 'Uniswap', 'AAVE', 'Compound', 'uni', 'maker'). Automatically resolves across data sources.

tools.name: defillama_get_chain_historical_tvl
tools.description: Get historical TVL data for blockchain ecosystems to track capital flows and identify mercenary capital patterns across chains.

tools.name: defillama_get_protocol_fees_history
tools.description: Get historical fees and revenue data to analyze protocol sustainability and real value generation beyond TVL incentives.

data_type.description: Data type to retrieve: 'dailyFees' for fees paid by users, 'dailyRevenue' for protocol revenue

tools.name: defillama_get_yields_historical
tools.description: Get historical yield/APY data for liquidity pools to analyze incentive effectiveness and reward sustainability patterns.

days.description: Number of days of historical data

pool_id.description: Pool ID from yields API (use yields search first to find pool IDs)

tools.name: defillama_get_stablecoin_historical
tools.description: Get historical stablecoin circulation data to track capital flows and identify mercenary capital patterns through stablecoin movement.

tools.name: defillama_compare_protocols_historical
tools.description: Compare historical TVL data across multiple protocols to identify relative performance and capital flow patterns.

protocols.description: Array of protocol slugs to compare (2-5 protocols)

normalize_to_start.description: Normalize all protocols to 100 at start date for relative comparison

tools.name: get_dex_volume
tools.description: Get comprehensive trading volume data for both spot and perpetuals trading. Automatically searches both DEX and derivatives APIs to provide complete volume analysis. Supports major protocols like Uniswap, Curve (spot) and GMX, Hyperliquid, dYdX (perpetuals). Returns separate data for spot and perpetuals when both are available.

protocol.description: Protocol name or slug (e.g., 'hyperliquid', 'gmx', 'uniswap', 'curve'). Will search both spot and perpetuals data automatically

days_limit.description: Number of days of historical data to include (7-365, default: 90)

include_breakdown.description: Include chain-level volume breakdown for multi-chain protocols

include_historical.description: Include historical volume data for trend analysis

tools.name: get_derivatives_overview
tools.description: Get comprehensive derivatives/perpetuals trading volume data for all protocols. Essential for perpetual DEX competitive analysis. Includes GMX, dYdX, Hyperliquid, Jupiter Perps, and other major perpetual trading platforms.

limit.description: Number of top protocols to return (1-100, default: 20)

min_volume_24h.description: Minimum 24h volume in USD to filter protocols

include_breakdown.description: Include chain-level volume breakdown for multi-chain protocols

tools.name: get_derivatives_volume
tools.description: Get detailed volume data for a specific derivatives/perpetuals protocol with historical analysis. Use for in-depth analysis of individual perpetual DEX protocols like GMX, dYdX, Hyperliquid, etc.

days_limit.description: Number of days of historical data to include (7-365, default: 90)

tools.name: get_protocol_revenue_overview
tools.description: Get comprehensive revenue and fees data for all DeFi protocols. Shows which protocols generate real revenue vs just TVL. Essential for analyzing protocol sustainability and value generation.

limit.description: Number of top protocols to return (1-100, default: 20)

data_type.description: Data type: 'dailyFees' for user fees paid, 'dailyRevenue' for protocol revenue

min_revenue_24h.description: Minimum 24h revenue/fees in USD to filter protocols

include_breakdown.description: Include chain-level breakdown for multi-chain protocols

tools.name: debank_get_top_holders
tools.description: Get top holders of a token using DeBank API. Returns ranked list of holders with addresses and amounts.

token_id.description: Token contract address or native token ID (e.g., '0x...', 'eth', 'bnb')

tools.name: debank_get_user_chains
tools.description: Get list of chains where a user has activity using DeBank API. Includes wallet birth timestamps.

tools.name: debank_get_user_history
tools.description: Get user's transaction history on a specific chain using DeBank API.

tools.name: debank_get_user_tokens
tools.description: Get user's token balances on a specific chain using DeBank API.

is_all.description: Include all tokens including zero balance

tools.name: debank_get_user_all_tokens
tools.description: Get user's token balances across all chains using DeBank API.

tools.name: debank_get_user_protocols
tools.description: Get user's DeFi protocol positions on a specific chain using DeBank API.

tools.name: debank_get_user_authorizations
tools.description: Get user's token approvals and authorizations on a specific chain using DeBank API.

tools.name: debank_analyze_token_holders
tools.description: Perform comprehensive holder analysis for a token including cross-chain activity and portfolio similarities.

token_id.description: Token contract address or native token ID (e.g., '0x...', 'eth', 'bnb')

tools.name: get_current_price
tools.description: Get current cryptocurrency prices with automatic source selection and intelligent fallbacks. Use for price discovery when you don't know which data source to use. Supports symbols (BTC, ETH), names (Bitcoin, Ethereum), or contract addresses across CoinGecko, CoinMarketCap, and DeFiLlama.

asset.description: Cryptocurrency symbol (BTC, ETH), name (Bitcoin, Ethereum), or contract address. Automatically resolves across all supported data sources

sources.description: Specific data sources to use (coingecko, cmc, defillama). Automatic selection if not specified

vs_currency.description: Target currency (usd, eur, btc, etc.). USD recommended for cross-protocol comparisons

include_market_data.description: Include market cap, volume, and 24h change data for comprehensive analysis

tools.name: compare_prices
tools.description: Compare current prices of multiple cryptocurrencies side by side with sorting and ranking. Use for market analysis, portfolio tracking, and relative performance assessment. Maximum 20 assets per request for optimal performance.

assets.description: Array of cryptocurrency symbols, names, or addresses to compare (2-20 items). Mix different asset types for comprehensive analysis

sort_by.description: Sort results by metric (market_cap for size ranking, change_24h for performance ranking)

vs_currency.description: Target currency for comparison (usd, eur, btc). USD recommended for relative valuation

tools.name: get_historical_price
tools.description: Get historical price data with intelligent multi-source aggregation for comprehensive trend analysis. Use for volatility assessment, pattern recognition, and performance tracking over custom timeframes. Automatically combines data from multiple sources for optimal coverage.

asset.description: Cryptocurrency symbol (BTC, ETH), name (Bitcoin, Ethereum), or contract address. Automatically resolves across all data sources

sources.description: Specific data sources to use (coingecko, cmc, defillama). Automatic selection for best coverage if not specified

end_date.description: End date in YYYY-MM-DD format (default: today). Typically current date for up-to-date analysis

start_date.description: Start date in YYYY-MM-DD format (default: 30 days ago). Use recent dates for short-term analysis, older dates for long-term trends

granularity.description: Data granularity (hourly for intraday analysis, daily for standard trends, weekly/monthly for long-term patterns)

vs_currency.description: Target currency (usd, eur, btc). USD recommended for cross-asset comparisons

include_volume.description: Include trading volume for liquidity analysis and trend confirmation

include_market_cap.description: Include market cap data for valuation analysis and size comparison

tools.name: get_price_analytics
tools.description: Generate comprehensive price analytics including volatility metrics, trend analysis, support/resistance levels, and technical indicators. Use for investment analysis, risk assessment, and trading insights with professional-grade calculations.

asset.description: Cryptocurrency symbol, name, or contract address. Supports all major cryptocurrencies

period.description: Analysis period (7d for short-term momentum, 30d for monthly trends, 90d for quarterly analysis, 1y for long-term patterns)

vs_currency.description: Target currency for analysis (usd, eur, btc). USD recommended for standard financial metrics

include_technical_indicators.description: Include technical indicators (SMA, RSI, Bollinger Bands). Requires sufficient data points

tools.name: search_assets
tools.description: Search for cryptocurrencies using smart matching. Supports partial names, symbols, categories, and more

query.description: Search query (partial name, symbol, category, etc.)

category.description: Filter by category (defi, layer-1, stablecoin, etc.)

include_prices.description: Include current price data (may increase response time)

tools.name: get_assets_by_category
tools.description: Get all cryptocurrencies in a specific category with current price data

tools.name: arkham_transfers_query
tools.description: 🔍 Query Arkham Intelligence for blockchain transfer data with advanced entity and flow filtering. Supports entity-based analysis, exchange identification, and comprehensive transfer tracking across multiple chains.

base.description: Entity IDs or addresses to query (e.g., ["binance"], ["0x123..."])

from.description: Source filters: entity IDs, addresses, "deposit:exchange", negations with "!"

tools.name: arkham_net_flow_by_wallet
tools.description: 📊 Calculate net inflow/outflow analysis for wallets or entities with optional token filtering. Provides comprehensive flow analysis by token with USD valuations.

base.description: Entity IDs or addresses to analyze

token_contracts.description: Token contract addresses for filtering (e.g., USDT, USDC addresses)

tools.name: arkham_exchange_deposit_activity
tools.description: 🏦 Track deposits from wallets/entities to exchange addresses with exchange identification and volume analysis. Supports fuzzy matching of exchange names (e.g., 'Binance', 'coinbase pro', 'CB').

base.description: Source entity IDs or addresses to track

exchange_ids.description: Exchange names or IDs (e.g., ["Binance", "Coinbase", "kraken"]). Supports fuzzy matching.

tools.name: arkham_entity_transfer_matrix
tools.description: 🔄 Analyze bidirectional transfer relationships between entities, creating a comprehensive transfer matrix with volume and frequency analysis. Supports fuzzy matching for exchange names.

base.description: Primary entity IDs, addresses, or exchange names (e.g., ["Binance", "0x123..."])

counterparties.description: Counterparty entity IDs, addresses, or exchange names to analyze relationships with

tools.name: arkham_wallet_activation_monitor
tools.description: 🔍 Monitor wallet activation patterns, detecting first activity or post-funding behaviors for security and compliance analysis.

mode.description: "first_seen" for earliest activity, "post_topup_first_out" for first outbound after receiving funds

tools.name: arkham_stablecoin_flows
tools.description: 💰 Analyze stablecoin transfer patterns and flows for entities, providing detailed USD flow analysis for compliance and treasury management.

base.description: Entity IDs or addresses to analyze

tools.name: top_tokens_metrics
tools.description: 🏆 Get comprehensive metrics for the top 10 institutional tokens (BTC, ETH, SOL, HYPE, ENA, SUI, XRP). Includes price data, volume metrics, calculated ratios, and DeFi protocol data in a single unified response. Perfect for institutional trading analysis and market overview.

limit.description: Maximum number of tokens to return (1-20, default: 10)

tokens.description: Specific tokens to analyze (default: top 10 institutional tokens). Use coin IDs like 'bitcoin', 'ethereum', 'solana'

time_period.description: Time period for volume and change metrics

include_defi.description: Include DeFi protocol metrics where applicable (TVL, fees, DEX volume)

include_ratios.description: Include calculated ratio metrics (volume/price, market cap/volume, etc.)

min_market_cap.description: Minimum market cap filter in USD (e.g., 1000000 for $1M+)

include_derivatives.description: Include derivatives data (funding rates, open interest) from Tardis

include_market_microstructure.description: Include market microstructure data (order book depth, bid-ask spread)

tools.name: ping
tools.description: Simple ping tool for testing the server connection and getting server status
